name: simple-blog
description: A simple static blog and presentation platform

scripts.make-dirs: mkdir -p dist/images dist/css dist/js dist/posts dist/presentations
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r images/* dist/images/ 2>/dev/null || : && cp -r css/* dist/css/ && cp -r js/* dist/js/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run make-dirs && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-html
